column1: An  analysis  of  tourist  arrivals  by  purpose  of  visit  reveals  that  a  majority  (66.0%)  of
tourists had visited Sri Lanka for pleasure/vacation, while for 22.0% of tourists the main
purpose  was  visiting  friends  and  relatives.  Only  2.5%  of  tourists  had  visited  for
business  related  purposes.  1.0%  had  visited  for  health-related  purposes,  while  0.7%
had visited for purposes such as sports and education.
